basic_information.scholarship_name: Tio ChuyÂ’s Auto Group Difference Maker Endowed Scholarship

description: To provide scholarships for UCO Students who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Current UCO Student or Incoming Freshman Cumulative 2.0 GPA - current student Cumulative 2.75 GPA - new student Member of Diversity Round Table or International Student Council Must have lived in the U.S. for at least 5 years Must have attended a U.S. high school Statement of financial need Preference is given to students who have or have had Deferred Action for Childhood Arrival Status Preference is given to students with evidence of community involvement This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
